entry.title: Current Conditions: 19.6°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 18. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with showers. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 10 September 2016
